title: Left Click Ping Problem
body: When I stared playing a game and I clicked the ping button I couldn't left click. Every time i tried to open the shop, see profiles and pause it would ping instead. It didn't let me exit the game when the game was finished. This has only happened once. I hope someone has the answer to this problem.

replies.body: If you play on borderless, all you have to do is alt+tab again and the problem is solved.
